data.meta_description: To keep up with what is happening at the Somerset Academies of Texas, follow this link.
data.text:
Brooks Academies of Texas Rebrands to Somerset Academies of Texas

FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE

San Antonio, TX - Today, Brooks Academies of Texas announced that it will be rebranding to Somerset Academies of Texas. The rebranding is in line with the Somerset Academy Inc brand, which has developed several successful charter schools that have won national blue ribbons.

As part of the rebranding, the names of the schools will change as well. Brooks Academy of Science and Engineering will be known as Somerset Brooks, Brooks Collegiate Academy will be known as Somerset Collegiate, Brooks Academy Lone Star will be known as Somerset Lone Star, and Brooks Academy Oaks will be known as Somerset Oaks.

"We are excited to officially join the Somerset Academy Inc family and continue to provide our students with a high-quality education," said Lisa Freeman Schutz, Superintendent of Somerset Academies of Texas.

"This rebranding is a great opportunity for us to align ourselves with a reputable organization that has a proven track record of success," said Bonnie Salas, Principal of Somerset Brooks.

"I am thrilled to be a part of the Somerset Academy Inc family and am looking forward to the opportunities this rebranding will bring to our school," said Lily Collins, Principal of Somerset Lone Star.

"We are excited to be a part of the Somerset Academy Inc brand and are confident that this rebranding will only enhance the education we provide our students," said TaLisa Wilson, Principal of Somerset Oaks.

"We are proud to be part of the Somerset Academy Inc family and are looking forward to the opportunities this rebranding will bring to our school," said Monique Almazan, Principal of Somerset Collegiate.

"We are thrilled to welcome Somerset Academies of Texas to our organization and are confident that this rebranding will only enhance the education provided to students in the Texas area," said Dr. Bernardo Montero, President of Somerset Academy Inc.

"I am excited for the rebranding of Brooks Academies of Texas to Somerset Academies of Texas, and I am confident that this rebranding will help to enhance the education provided to our students," said Todd German, Board Chairman of Somerset Academies of Texas.
